sentences.en: A pair of wide tracks led through the slush and mud.
sentences.cn: 脏雪和烂泥上有一行很宽的脚印.

sentences.en: Becker's eyes were as cold and grey as the slush on the pavements outside.
sentences.cn: 贝克尔的目光冷淡而灰暗，一如外面人行道上的雪泥。

sentences.en: Deep slush underfoot made her shoes wet.
sentences.cn: 脚下很深的雪水弄湿了她的鞋.

sentences.en: Front-drive cars work better in the snow and slush.
sentences.cn: 前轮驱动的汽车在雪中和雪泥中开得更好。

sentences.en: He stopped stock still, his frayed trousers soaking in the slush, and peered foolishly in.
sentences.cn: 他一动不动地站住了, 磨破的裤脚浸在雪水里,呆头呆脑地望着里面.

sentences.en: He's accused of misusing $17.5 million from a secret government slush fund.
sentences.cn: 他被指控滥用秘密的政府行贿基金，金额达1,750万美元。

sentences.en: In the city the clean white snow had turned to grey slush.
sentences.cn: 在城市里，洁白的雪已化为灰色的雪泥。

sentences.en: Landed here, he turned to walk back along Seventh Avenue, but the slush was too much.
sentences.cn: 他在这里下了车, 转身沿着第七大道往回走, 但是路上泥泞不堪.

sentences.en: Pedestrians were splashed to the hip in muddy slush.
sentences.cn: 行人走在泥浆中,下半身全溅上了污泥.

sentences.en: The car shot swiftly over the slush.
sentences.cn: 汽车在泥泞的融雪中疾驰.

sentences.en: The rain turned the snow to slush and made the mountain - side dismal.
sentences.cn: 雨使雪化成了雪水,搞得山边景色黯然无趣.

sentences.en: The snow had turned to slush.
The snow has melted into slush.
There was dirty brown slush all over the roads and pavements.
sentences.cn: 马路和人行道上到处都是肮脏的褐色雪泥.

sentences.en: Yes, autumn is here with the drizzle and slush.
sentences.cn: 彼:对呀, 下毛毛雨,到处是泥泞污水,这表明秋天来到了.

words.tran_cn: 船上的厨子；（澳）厨子的助手
烂泥；污水；水泥砂浆；胡说八道
溅湿；给…灌砂浆；给…上润滑油

trans.tran_en: Slush is snow that has begun to melt and is therefore very wet and dirty
